reviewText: My daughter loves Mother Goose Club. The video content itself is nice but it is really short. For almost $15 I would expect at least  few hours rather than 30 some odd minutes.
My kids love these songs. They get so animated watching, and the cast of the videos is such a talented bunch!

My one year old daughter loves this DVD.  She is a huge fan of Mother Goose Club.  The DVD keeps her entertained just long enough to finish cooking and preparing for the next day.  Great video to wind down the evening!!!
My daughter loves this video. The costumes are great and songs are easy to for a toddler to sing along to.
We enjoy it but......our granddaughter absolutely loves it.  She has never sat down and watched a video beginning to end before this.
my daughters loooove these songs and would watch all day if allowed (ages 1 and 3)
My daughter is 16 months and has been obsessed with this show since about 10 months. We do the dinosaur stomp and sing the freight train song a lot. I feel it was a little expensive but that's okay.
My two year old grandson is thrilled with this dvd. He perfers it over any cartoon dvd's he has seen and seems to be learning a lot from it. Thanks!
Doesnt work in my truck but works on computer

When our local network stopped showing the Mother Goose Club my 2 year old granddaughter had the meltdown of all meltdowns. She is receiving Early Intervention for some sensory processing issues and this disruption to her routine was devastating for all of us. :) Thank goodness for Amazon - I was able to order these CD's and they were delivered in a few short days. As to the CD's themselves - I like them. I find them much more palatable than some of the other children's video's out there. They feature all those nursery rhymes that I grew up with so it's easy for me to sing along and to incorporate songs into our daily routine - Itsy Bitsy Spider is currently making changing her diaper much more manageable. :) Video quality is excellent, colors are bright, characters are energetic and happy and songs are simple Also, some songs are .easy to dance to and jump around. I ordered the 3 CD set so we can switch them up and I don't have to listen to the same songs every day I watch her.. Am glad I purchased them so we are not dependent on TV and I can keep them for future grandchildren. Very satisfied with this purchase.
Holds little ones' attention, and is super entertaining...
It's educational and entertaining for kids, my kids love it
My four grandsons (all 3 years old and younger) love the Mother Goose Club!  They seem mesmerized by the songs and performance.

The five stars is misleading...I do not love this but my grandson adores "goose." He is two and will watch this for about 20 minutes, which is at least 10 minutes longer than he watches most things. He likes to try to mimic the movements and some of the songs. We use this for getting ready in the morning when he stays overnight.
I have an education background and feel this series is pretty good from that standpoint. The rhythm varies from quick 10 second bits to longer songs. Many of the songs are familiar, so you can start singing along right away. There are always simple movements/dances that go along witht the songs that encourage gross motor movement.

Now, she can watch it in the car and on the air plane when we travel without interruption.

My 14 month old daughter loves the songs and characters!  She dances along and has learned to do the same hand movements such as Itsy Bitsy Spider and Heads, Shoulders, Knees & Toes.  It's so cute to see her following along!  I especially like that the entire video contains the actual lovable characters and not plain kids and plain adults singing the songs with bad tunes and bad video like the other episodes.  I can't stand those.  (Even the cartoon versions aren't as bad as those!) The characters in this video are not scary or creepy!  Definitely one of my favorite kids video!  I don't mind that there is no list of songs since after watching it repeatedly, I know what's next and so does my daughter.  Here's the list in case it helps anyone reading this:
1. Itsy Bitsy Spider
2. Dinosaur Stomp
3. Five Little Monkeys
4. Row Row Row Your Boat
5. If You're Happy and You Know It
6. Driving in My Car
7. Day-O
8. This Little Light of Mine
9. Little Bo Peep
10. Head, Shoulders, Knees and Toes
11. Where Is Thumbkin?
12. Mr. Sun
13. ABC Song
14. Hello Friend
15. The Bunny Hop
16. Mary, Mary, Quite Contrary
17. Pat-a-Cake
18. Clap Your Hands
19. Old MacDonald Had a Farm
20. Peek-a-Boo

I get home from work and the first thing my one and a half year old son is take my iPhone out of my pocket and open YouTube Kids so he can watch Mother Goose Club. He absolutely loves the show, its the only show that he will just sit and watch.  Only problem is that it can be very hard to pull him away from it.

I love the mother goose club videos. They keep my one year old entertained while helping him learn, and after hundreds of hours watching on youtube, I can still enjoy them too. Unfortunately, after buying this video for my android to keep him happy on our flight tomorrow, I found out it was not compatible with my device. My fault for not double checking. I had assumed that since I've downloaded videos from amazon before, this time would be no different. I was wrong. Amazon changed their settings for downloads 2 months ago :-( Make sure you double check so you can enjoy this awesome show!
My 18 month old granddaughter watches the Mother Goose Club constantly - she asks for it and for whatever reason, she stops everything and does all the songs. Fantastic product.

I found the Mother Goose Club about a year ago when trolling YouTube for videos of "The Wheels on the Bus".  Once I introduced this group to my 2 year old, he was hooked.  I am SOOOOO thrilled that this DVD exists and we are all loving it.  Nothing beats being able to pop this in the DVD player and hearing the catchy tunes one after another rather than search for each individual video on YouTube.  I highly recommend to anyone who has small kids and are weary of putting them in front of the TV with any old video or movie. The Mother Goose Club gets my son singing and dancing every time.
